  • Object Mappers

Object Mapper Feature Tests

General information

The goal of this project is to monitor support for important features across multiple libraries.

You can find the code behind these tables in net-feature-tests GitHub project.

Please note the following:

  1. The list of features is based on what I consider to be important. It is not an objective measure on which library is "better".
  2. It is not possible to test for all features automatically. For example, extensibility is very important, but impossible to test/measure.
  3. The test results might not necessary be up to date (see the version for each library).
  4. The test code should not be seen as best practice for each library â€” it forces all of them to the same test interface.
  5. I am not an expert on all libraries and not all adapters were reviewed by authors. So feature may fail because of incorrect adapter.

Thanks for reading!

Mapper list

Version

Not necessarily the latest version, but the one we are testing.

Downloads

Total downloads of the NuGet package.

Total Score

Total Score is based on total amount of feature tests passed.

Most tables give one point per success, but some (such as List support) give one point per table.
The score is only for quick comparison, please read individual tables for the details.

  Version Released Web Site Downloads Total Score
AutoMapper 3.1.0.0 nov 2013 link 579 561 100%
EmitMapper 1.0.0.0 jul 2011 link 7 745 100%

Supported .NET versions

This information is based on versions included in NuGet package.

AutoMapper yes yes yes yes yes yes
EmitMapper yes yes yes yes yes yes
